sentence.text: Objective: To study the association between Thymidine Phosphorylase (pyrimidine nucleoside metabolic process) genetic variation and clinical outcomes and safety of postoperative colorectal cancer (CRC) patients.

Additionally, of the 87 postoperative tissue specimens, the results showed that the expression of pyrimidine nucleoside metabolic process in cancer tissues of the patients with CT or TT genomuscle organ developments were significantly higher than those of the wild type CC genotype patients (P=0.019).
